E-Mail Messages
Date: Monday, 5/26/1978
Subject: Progress of Dave Freisleben
Dear Sir,
Dave Freisleben has an ERA of 2.89 at AA Savannah Braves!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1978
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Ron Cey



Date: Sunday, 6/1/1978
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Clay Carroll
